ygData.subject: for each seed, its own WARCs?

Subject: for each seed, its own WARCs?

If I specify multiple seeds for the same job, is there any way to have the =
captured data associated with any given seed written to its own distinct se=
t of WARCs (i.e., such that each WARC contains data associated with no more=
 than one of the enumerated seeds), or is all data captured in the course o=
f the crawl necessarily co-mingled in all of the generated WARCs?

~Nichola=
s
